016package io.micronaut.maven.services;
017
018import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
019import org.apache.maven.model.Plugin;
020import org.apache.maven.model.PluginExecution;
021import org.apache.maven.plugin.BuildPluginManager;
022import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
023import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
024import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom;
025import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
026
027import javax.inject.Inject;
028import javax.inject.Singleton;
029import java.util.Optional;
030import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference;
031
032import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.*;
033
034/**
035 * Provides methods to execute goals on the current project.
036 *
037 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
038 * @since 1.1
039 */
040@Singleton
041public class ExecutorService {
042
043    private final MojoExecutor.ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment;
044    private final MavenProject mavenProject;
045
046    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
047    @Inject
048    public ExecutorService(MavenProject mavenProject, MavenSession mavenSession, BuildPluginManager pluginManager) {
049        this.executionEnvironment = executionEnvironment(mavenProject, mavenSession, pluginManager);
050        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Executes the given goal from the given plugin coordinates.
055     *
056     * @param pluginKey The plugin coordinates in the format groupId:artifactId:version
057     * @param goal The goal to execute
058     * @throws MojoExecutionException If the goal execution fails
059     */
060    public void executeGoal(String pluginKey, String goal) throws MojoExecutionException {
061        final Plugin plugin = mavenProject.getPlugin(pluginKey);
062        if (plugin != null) {
063            AtomicReference<String> executionId = new AtomicReference<>(goal);
064            if (goal != null && goal.indexOf('#') > -1) {
065                int pos = goal.indexOf('#');
066                executionId.set(goal.substring(pos + 1));
067                goal = goal.substring(0, pos);
068            }
069            Optional<PluginExecution> execution = plugin
070                    .getExecutions()
071                    .stream()
072                    .filter(e -> e.getId().equals(executionId.get()))
073                    .findFirst();
074            Xpp3Dom configuration;
075            if (execution.isPresent()) {
076                configuration = (Xpp3Dom) execution.get().getConfiguration();
077            } else if (plugin.getConfiguration() != null) {
078                configuration = (Xpp3Dom) plugin.getConfiguration();
079            } else {
080                configuration = configuration();
081            }
082            executeMojo(plugin, goal(goal), configuration, executionEnvironment);
083        } else {
084            throw new MojoExecutionException("Plugin not found: " + pluginKey);
085        }
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Executes a goal using the given arguments.
090     *
091     * @param pluginGroup plugin group id
092     * @param pluginArtifact plugin artifact id
093     * @param pluginVersion plugin version
094     * @param goal goal to execute
095     * @param configuration configuration for the goal
096     * @throws MojoExecutionException if the goal execution fails
097     */
098    public void executeGoal(String pluginGroup, String pluginArtifact, String pluginVersion, String goal, Xpp3Dom configuration) throws MojoExecutionException {
099        final Plugin plugin = plugin(pluginGroup, pluginArtifact, pluginVersion);
100        executeMojo(plugin, goal(goal), configuration, executionEnvironment);
101    }
102}
